掏.definition: to fish out (from pocket); to scoop

掏出.definition: to fish out; to take out (from a pocket, bag etc)

掏心掏肺.definition: to be totally devoted (to a person)

掏空.definition: to hollow out; to empty out; to use up; (finance) tunneling

掏耳.definition: to remove earwax with an ear pick

掏腰包.definition: to dip into one's pocket; to pay out of pocket; to foot the bill

掏錢.definition: to pay; to spend money; to fork out
